name: Empire
title: Utf8b8jnlg Ripples Roast
text:
Synopsis
XRP is approaching its all-time high, signaling potential momentum in the cryptocurrency market and reflecting broader shifts in crypto adoption and market sentiment.

Key Insights
- XRP reached near its historical peak of $3.3991 on Binance, close to its 2018 all-time high of $3.84
- When adjusted for inflation, XRP would need to rally another 25% to truly break its all-time high
- Despite the rally, XRP remains down 64% against ETH and 42% against BTC since their respective launches
- Coinbase and Morpho have launched a new lending product allowing users to borrow USDC against bitcoin held on Coinbase
- Coinbase's VP of Product Max Branzburg indicated this is just the start, with plans to expand onchain lending to other assets
- The partnership represents a strategic move to make bitcoin more utilizable and accessible to users
- Ripple has evolved its branding from a payments protocol to positioning itself as "pioneers in crypto"
